Tab1Text1:
Rule 1: Dont be a Dick
Rule 2: Defensive foundationing around your base is Acceptable, However Glitching foundations under the map is not.
Rule 3: Dont Wipe new players. it makes you a Dick.
Tab2Text1: We have 3 Servers Clustered Together. Ragnarok, Valguero and Extinction,  so travel to any Obelisk and Add them to your Favourites too
Tab3Text1:
Pushing F7 while you have a GPS will bring up a GPS and Map HUD
Pushing F8 will bring up the settings for it.
Tab4Text1:
W have Custom Rewards on this Server. Just craft a TCs Rewards Vault to claim them
You can get a Free Item Pack and Starter base for 1 Time only. 

You will earn 20 ARC every hour you play on the server!
Spend Ark to get Base/item Upgrades or Max Level Dinos
Tab5Text1: All Drops and Crates have custom items in them Designed for pvp. Drops with an orange ring around them have a chance to Drop Blueprints
Tab5Text2:
All Boss Drops have their element Increased.
Gamma = 100 Element, Gamma Trophy + Gamma King Titan Trophy
Beta = 175 Element, Beta Trophy  + Beta King Titan Trophy
Alpha = 250 Element, Alpha Trophy  + Alpha King Titan Trophy
Tab5Text3:
Bases using this can Still Be Raided offline. However it will Significantly increase the Defence of a Base.
* Dinos will be invincible inside. 
* Structures will have x6 HP.  
* Turrets will do 5x Damage.
